people_also_ask.question: Can we play GTA 3 on Android?
people_also_ask.heading: In celebration of the franchise's 10th anniversary, Rockstar Game has released the critically acclaimed crime game, Grand Theft Auto 3 or GTA 3, to mobile devices. This version of the action game will bring to life the dark and seedy underworld of Liberty City straight to your phone.
people_also_ask.title: GTA 3 for Android - Download

people_also_ask.question: Can I play GTA 3?
people_also_ask.heading: Can I Run GTA 3? The GTA 3 system requirements are the same as the other GTA games included in Rockstar's new GTA The Trilogy - Definitive Edition. You'll need at least an Intel® Core™ i5-6600K or AMD FX-6300 CPU, 8GB of RAM, and an Nvidia GeForce GTX 760 2GB or AMD Radeon R9 280 3GB.

knowledge_panel.description: grand theft auto iii is a 2001 action-adventure game developed by dma design and published by rockstar games. it is the third main entry in the grand theft auto series, following 1999's grand theft auto 2, and the fifth instalment overall. wikipedia
